verses.verse: וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> an altar עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> [of] shittim חָמֵשׁ֩ <WH2568> five אַמּ֨וֹת <WH520> cubits אֹ֜רֶךְ <WH753> long וְחָמֵ֧שׁ <WH2568> and five אַמּ֣וֹת <WH520> cubits רֹ֗חַב <WH7341> broad רָב֤וּעַ <WH7251> shall be foursquare יִהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> become הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> the altar וְשָׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> thereof [shall be] three אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> cubits קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6967> and the height

וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make קַרְנֹתָ֗יו <WH7161> the horns עַ֚ל <WH5921> on אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> of it upon the four פִּנֹּתָ֔יו <WH6438> corners מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at תִּהְיֶ֣יןָ <WH1961> become קַרְנֹתָ֑יו <WH7161> thereof his horns וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <WH6823> shall be of the same and thou shalt overlay אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> it with brass

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make סִּֽירֹתָיו֙ <WH5518> his pans לְדַשְּׁנ֔וֹ <WH1878> to receive his ashes וְיָעָיו֙ <WH3257> and his shovels וּמִזְרְקֹתָ֔יו <WH4219> and his basons וּמִזְלְגֹתָ֖יו <WH4207> and his fleshhooks וּמַחְתֹּתָ֑יו <WH4289> and his firepans לְכָל־ <WH3605> all כֵּלָ֖יו <WH3627> all the vessels תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> thereof thou shalt make נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> [of] brass

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make לּוֹ֙ מִכְבָּ֔ר <WH4345> for it a grate מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> of network רֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7568> and upon the net נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> [of] brass וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> shalt thou make עַל־ <WH5921> and on הָרֶ֗שֶׁת <WH7568> the net אַרְבַּע֙ <WH702> four טַבְּעֹ֣ת <WH2885> rings נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <WH5178> brasen עַ֖ל <WH5921> and אַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> in the four קְצוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH7098> corners

וְנָתַתָּ֣ה <WH5414> And thou shalt put אֹתָ֗הּ <WH853> תַּ֛חַת <WH8478> beneath כַּרְכֹּ֥ב <WH3749> it under the compass הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> of the altar מִלְּמָ֑טָּה <WH4295> beneath וְהָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> will reach הָרֶ֔שֶׁת <WH7568> that the net עַ֖ד <WH5704> may be even to חֲצִ֥י <WH2677> the midst הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> of the altar

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make בַדִּים֙ <WH905> staves לַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> for the altar בַּדֵּ֖י <WH905> staves עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> [of] shittim וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <WH6823> and overlay אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> them with brass

וְהוּבָ֥א <WH935> shall be put אֶת־ <WH853> בַּדָּ֖יו <WH905> And the staves בַּטַּבָּעֹ֑ת <WH2885> into the rings וְהָי֣וּ <WH1961> become הַבַּדִּ֗ים <WH905> and the staves עַל־ <WH5921> upon שְׁתֵּ֛י <WH8147> shall be upon the two צַלְעֹ֥ת <WH6763> sides הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> of the altar בִּשְׂאֵ֥ת <WH5375> to bear אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

נְב֥וּב <WH5014> Hollow לֻחֹ֖ת <WH3871> with boards תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> shalt thou make אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> it הֶרְאָ֥ה <WH7200> it as it was shewed אֹתְךָ֛ <WH853> בָּהָ֖ר <WH2022> thee in the mount כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> so יַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> so shall they make ס

וְעָשִׂ֕יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make אֵ֖ת <WH853> חֲצַ֣ר <WH2691> the court הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle לִפְאַ֣ת <WH6285> side נֶֽגֶב־ <WH5045> for the south תֵּ֠ימָנָה <WH8486> southward קְלָעִ֨ים <WH7050> [there shall be] hangings לֶחָצֵ֜ר <WH2691> for the court שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8336> linen מָשְׁזָ֗ר <WH7806> [of] fine twined מֵאָ֤ה <WH3967> of an hundred בָֽאַמָּה֙ <WH520> cubits אֹ֔רֶךְ <WH753> long לַפֵּאָ֖ה <WH6285> side הָאֶחָֽת׃ <WH259> for one

וְעַמֻּדָ֣יו <WH5982> pillars עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <WH6242> And the twenty וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH134> sockets עֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> thereof and their twenty נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> [shall be of] brass וָוֵ֧י <WH2053> the hooks הָעַמֻּדִ֛ים <WH5982> of the pillars וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2838> and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> [shall be of] silver

וְכֵ֨ן <WH3651> Likewise לִפְאַ֤ת <WH6285> side צָפוֹן֙ <WH6828> And likewise for the north בָּאֹ֔רֶךְ <WH753> in length קְלָעִ֖ים <WH7050> [there shall be] hangings מֵ֣אָה <WH3967> of an hundred אֹ֑רֶךְ <WH753> [cubits] long [וְעַמְדּוּ כ] (וְעַמּוּדָ֣יו <WH5982> pillars ק) עֶשְׂרִ֗ים <WH6242> and his twenty וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֤ם <WH134> sockets עֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> and their twenty נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <WH5178> [of] brass וָוֵ֧י <WH2053> the hooks הָֽעַמֻּדִ֛ים <WH5982> pillars וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2838> and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> [of] silver

וְרֹ֤חַב <WH7341> And [for] the breadth הֶֽחָצֵר֙ <WH2691> of the court לִפְאַת־ <WH6285> side יָ֔ם <WH3220> on the west קְלָעִ֖ים <WH7050> [shall be] hangings חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> of fifty אַמָּ֑ה <WH520> cubits עַמֻּדֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5982> their pillars עֲשָׂרָ֔ה <WH6235> ten וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH134> and their sockets עֲשָׂרָֽה׃ <WH6235> ten

וְרֹ֣חַב <WH7341> And the breadth הֶֽחָצֵ֗ר <WH2691> of the court לִפְאַ֛ת <WH6285> side קֵ֥דְמָה <WH6924> on the east מִזְרָ֖חָה <WH4217> eastward חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> [shall be] fifty אַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> cubits

וַחֲמֵ֨שׁ <WH2568> fif עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> teen אַמָּ֛ה <WH520> cubits קְלָעִ֖ים <WH7050> The hangings לַכָּתֵ֑ף <WH3802> of one side עַמֻּדֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5982> their pillars שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה <WH7969> three וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH134> and their sockets שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> three

וְלַכָּתֵף֙ <WH3802> side הַשֵּׁנִ֔ית <WH8145> And on the other חְמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> fif עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> teen קְלָעִ֑ים <WH7050> [shall be] hangings עַמֻּדֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5982> [cubits] their pillars שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה <WH7969> three וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH134> and their sockets שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> three

וּלְשַׁ֨עַר <WH8179> And for the gate הֶֽחָצֵ֜ר <WH2691> of the court מָסָ֣ךְ ׀ <WH4539> [shall be] an hanging עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> of twenty אַמָּ֗ה <WH520> cubits תְּכֵ֨לֶת <WH8504> [of] blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֜ן <WH713> and purple וְתוֹלַ֧עַת <WH8438> oppressor שָׁנִ֛י <WH8144> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8336> linen מָשְׁזָ֖ר <WH7806> and fine twined מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> the work רֹקֵ֑ם <WH7551> of a weaver עַמֻּֽדֵיהֶם֙ <WH5982> [and] their pillars אַרְבָּעָ֔ה <WH702> [shall be] four וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH134> and their sockets אַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> four

כָּל־ <WH3605> All עַמּוּדֵ֨י <WH5982> All the pillars הֶֽחָצֵ֤ר <WH2691> the court סָבִיב֙ <WH5439> round about מְחֻשָּׁקִ֣ים <WH2836> [shall be] filleted כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> with silver וָוֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2053> their hooks כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> [shall be of] silver וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH134> and their sockets נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> [of] brass

אֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> The length הֶֽחָצֵר֩ <WH2691> of the court מֵאָ֨ה <WH3967> [shall be] an hundred בָֽאַמָּ֜ה <WH520> cubits וְרֹ֣חַב ׀ <WH7341> and the breadth חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> fifty בַּחֲמִשִּׁ֗ים <WH2572> every where וְקֹמָ֛ה <WH6967> and the height חָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> five אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> cubits שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8336> linen מָשְׁזָ֑ר <WH7806> [of] fine twined וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH134> and their sockets נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> [of] brass

לְכֹל֙ <WH3605> All כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> All the vessels הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all עֲבֹדָת֑וֹ <WH5656> in all the service וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יְתֵדֹתָ֛יו <WH3489> thereof and all the pins וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִתְדֹ֥ת <WH3489> thereof and all the pins הֶחָצֵ֖ר <WH2691> of the court נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> [shall be of] brass ס

וְאַתָּ֞ה <WH859> You תְּצַוֶּ֣ה ׀ <WH6680> And thou shalt command אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וְיִקְח֨וּ <WH3947> that they bring אֵלֶ֜יךָ <WH413> about שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> oil זַ֥יִת <WH2132> olive זָ֛ךְ <WH2134> thee pure כָּתִ֖ית <WH3795> beaten לַמָּא֑וֹר <WH3974> for the light לְהַעֲלֹ֥ת <WH5927> to burn נֵ֖ר <WH5216> to cause the lamp תָּמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> always

בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> In the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֩ <WH4150> of the congregation מִח֨וּץ <WH2351> without לַפָּרֹ֜כֶת <WH6532> the vail אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is before הָעֵדֻ֗ת <WH5715> which [is] before the testimony יַעֲרֹךְ֩ <WH6186> shall order אֹת֨וֹ <WH853> אַהֲרֹ֧ן <WH175> Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <WH1121> and his sons מֵעֶ֥רֶב <WH6153> it from evening עַד־ <WH5704> against בֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> to morning לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD חֻקַּ֤ת <WH2708> [it shall be] a statute עוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> for ever לְדֹ֣רֹתָ֔ם <WH1755> unto their generations מֵאֵ֖ת <WH854> for בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> on the behalf of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס
